item.description:
October's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Where to begin?

Challenge: Bring an opening paragraph that grabbed you. Do you know why it worked on you?

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: Beginnings. What makes a good beginning? This is the point where you have to sell your story. Not the middle, not the ending, the beginning. How do you get readers to turn that first page?


5:00 Break
**Off-topic discussion will ensue after the break.

6:00 Go Home and Write!
item.how_to_find_us: I will stake out some seating in the back

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers October Meetup
